inn1.comm: length ball on the pads, a bit of swing as well, off the pads behind square leg for a leg-bye
pitched up, slight movement away after pitching outside off, Kamran Akmal shoulders arms to that one
goes straight on this time, Bhuveshwar keeps it about a foot outside off stump, another leave from Kamran
gets the outside edge this time but it doesn't carry to slip, Raina does well to get a hand on that
fuller one, not much swing for Bhuvneshwar, solidly defended to the off side by Jamshed
sends it past slip for a single, three off the first over

Jamshed looks stunned after he is given lbw, looked like it pitched outside leg, reviewed after a chat with Akmal, looks like a good review, that just pitched in line, but hit Jamshed high on the flap of the pad, the ball would have sailed over the bails, decision overturned, Jamshed survives
swing for Umesh, pitched up and swerves in towards off stump, solidly defended by Jamshed
wrong line this time from Uimesh, on the pads, and that is tucked behind square leg for a single
again /umesh gets the ball to jag away after pitching, 136.5kph, outside off, Akmal is drawn that that one initially before he withdraws his bat and leave the ball to the keeper
134kph, too far outside of to interest Kamran
short of length ball angling into the pads, 137kph, defended to the leg side
pitched up and on off stump, Jamshed blocks it to the off side
length ball is defended towards covers by Jamshed, not much movement for Bhuvneshwar this over

there the breakthrough! this time he gets the ball to move away a bit, Jamshed plays at it since it isn't too far from off stump, not much footwork from Jamshed there, he pokes and edges it through to Raina at second slip, Jamshed can't extend his terrific run against India, this is his lowest score against India
length ball just outside off, Hafeez is beaten by that one
short and wide outside off, Hafeez slaps it towards point, was in the air for a while but falls short of the fielder there
full ball just outside off stump, carefully blocked down the track, a wicket maiden for Bhuvneshwar
Akmal pegged back by the short of length ball, another outside edge, down towards third man for a single
pitched up and outside off, 133.7kph from Umesh, Hafeez is invited to drive, another thick edge, down towards third man for another single
on middle and leg, full delivery is worked towards fine leg for a single
outside off, length ball, stays a bit lower than Akmal expected, he flails at it outside off and misses
pitched up once more, 139.2kph, Akmal defends that, bounces near his foot and goes back towards Umesh
short of length ball is clipped off the back foot towards midwicket, a smart stop there
length ball outside off, 127kph, defended towards backward point by Akmal
same length, closer to off stump, defended towards point once more
extra bounce there for Bhuvneshwar, 130kph this time, short of length outside off, Akmal is surprised by how much that rose up, leaves it to the keeper
from a shorter run-up this time, full and on middle, pushed towards mid-on
length ball outside off, pushed towards cover off the front foot
Bhuveshwar keeping it tight here, no width at all for the batsman, on middle and off this time, more defence from Akmal, another maiden for Bhuvneshwar, he has figures of 3-2-2-1
short of length ball, 140kph, just outside off, guided towards backward point
closer to off, similar length, steered down towards third man for a single
pitched up, on middle stump, pushed towards wide mid-on by Akmal, who has made a patient start
just as I talked about patience, Akmal decides to go for the pull to a short ball, badly mistimed and it loops in the air, but lands wide of the man at midwicket
lovely stroke from Hafeez there, pitched up and outside off, gets a good stride in and drives that past cover for four
short ball, 138.6kph, Hafeez goes for the pull, connects well, and that is running away towards the deep square leg boundary, Ishant runs across but he can't get there in time
the runs beginning to flow now for Pakistan, a flamboyant hit from Akmal, who advances down the track and pulls that short of length ball away to the square leg boundary
length ball just outside off, Akmal gets forward and drives crisply, Kohli at cover gets a hand on that but can't prevent the single

another boundary, but not much credit to the batsman for that one, it was short and wide from Bhuvneshwar, Hafeez goes for the cut, gets a thick under edge and it is rolls to the left of Dhoni for four
length ball just outside off, solid defence from Hafeez
short of length outside off, defended off the front foot towards cover
stays a touch lower this time, short and well outside off, Hafeez looks to cut but that sneaks under his bat, no bottom edge even this time
Ishant starts off his spell with a length ball that is defended to the off side
fuller and on the pads, Akmal looks to glance that to fine leg but can't time it properly
back of length ball outside off, cracked past point for four by Akmal, gets well forward as he plays that square drive
on middle and leg, defended to the leg side
short of length and outside off, driven towards extra cover for a single
on the pads, not the best line from Ishant, glanced down to fine leg for four, Pakistan picking up momentum here
just outside off, Kamran Akmal punches that towards cover, thinks about a single but decides against it
short of length ball just outside off, defended towards cover
on middle and off this time, pushed towards wide mid-on for a single
feels for that one outside off, Hafeez lucky not to get an edge through to the keeper, not too much movement for Bhuvneshwar just a hint of curve away this time, enough to beat Hafeez
length ball outside off, defended towards cover off the front foot
pitched up by Bhuvneshwar accurate as ever, that was homing in on off stump, defended to the off side
length ball just outside off, flayed towards mid-off by Akmal, powerfully struck but not placed well enough
short of length, keeps it around off stump, 131kph, pushed towards cover this time
on middle stump, tucked toward mid-on for a quick single, not much happening for Ishant here
short of length ball outside off, cleverly done by Hafeez, he walks across the stumps and clips that behind square leg for four, doesn't try to hit that too hard
pitched up on off stump, Hafeez nudges the ball towards square leg for two more
a bit of movement away after pitching outside off, Hafeez shoulders arms
Bhuvneshwar starts his sixth over, 128.1kph ball, on off stump as usual, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
a rare wide delivery from Bhuvneshwar, it was pitched up and Hafeez went for the big drive, he can't connect
reverts to that off stump line, length delivery is defended to the off side
short of length ball on middle stump, slapped towards deep backward square leg

just clear of mid-off, could have been a second wicket for India there, but despite a superb effort from Karthik it evades him, length ball that Akmal wanted to launch over long-off, hit low on the bat and the ball loops towards the fielder who has to run back and to his right to try catch that, Karthik dives but can't snaffle that one
pushed towards mid-on, Hafeez wanted one but is sent back, makes it in time to beat the throw
length ball on off, defended towards the off side
an appeal for caught-behind after Ishant send the ball down the leg side, think it took the pad on the way to Dhoni
worked towards midwicket for an easy single
short ball, an awkward-looking pull from Kamran, connects well enough to fetch him a single
length ball on off stump, defended to the right of the bowler
short of length ball outside off, punched through covers but there is a sweeper cover in place, Pakistan's 50 comes up
wicket first ball after the interruption, Bhuvneshwar strikes, it was a length ball outside off, Hafeez flirts with it and gets an edge, Dhoni dives to his right to take a low one-handed catch
Asad Shafiq is the new batsman, solid forward defensive first up
length ball outside off, 125kph, left alone
a mistimed slap towards cover by Shafiq
slants in towards the off stump, more forward defence
short of length ball just outside off, punched off the back foot towards point, a bit of a misfield there, and a single results
some turn for Ashwin there, he starts with a length ball that spins down the leg side, clipped behind square leg
fuller ball outside off, defended from the crease to the off side
flighted delivery spins sharply in, struck on the pads after beating the inside-edge, that was sliding down the leg side
blocked from the crease to the off side
length ball that doesn't turn too much, on off and middle stump, defended to the leg side
length ball outside off, clipped to square leg for a single
Bhuvneshwar gets his eight over, length ball outside off is defended to the off side
looks to drive, connects well but can't pierce the gap
length ball once more, very accurate from Bhuvneshwar, blocked towards cover
angling in, heading for middle stump, worked with the angle towards square leg where Ishant fields
back of length ball just outside off, 128kph, defended towards midwicket

terrific bit of fielding there from Raina, first up it was a lovely drive from Shafiq, Raina st short cover manages to make a one-handed stop and then spins and fires the ball towards the non-striker's end, Akmal has to dive to ensure he's in

Akmal has walked! a flighted delivery that spins in, Akmal unwisely went for the big drive against the turn, gets an inside edge, and that deflects off Dhoni left thigh and the ball sits up for Kohli at leg slip, the Indians go up in appeal, Akmal not waiting for the umpire's verdict, over to Misbah for the rescue act again
spins in towards off stump, blocked from the crease
spins sharply in towards off stump, defended towards midwicket for a single
shuffles across and tucks that towards wide mid-on
spins in once more, worked towards midwicket for one more
length ball is driven towards sweeper cover, Bhuvneshwar has to run across a long way to his right to stop that
works it towards third man for a single
that one from Umesh rears up outside off, steered towards third man for one more
length ball outside off, and that is left alone by Misbah
full ball heading for off stump, Misbah drives that towards mid-off
length ball just outside off, Misbah goes back in the crease and tucks the ball towards square leg for a single
a leading edge as Shafiq looks to work a back of length ball to the leg side, it flies to the left of the bowler
full ball from Ashwin, Misbah looking to work the ball to leg, ends up defending it
blocked to the off side this time
gets well forward and defends in the direction of point
full and outside off, a wristy shot towards mid-on
spins in from a length outside off, defended off the back foot
flighted delivery, the topspinner, defended from the crease
pushed to the right of the bowler
full ball is dead-batted back towards the bowler
short of length ball, sits up for Shafiq who pulls it powerfully past midwicket for four
shorter this time and just outside off, Shafiq gets on his knee and sways out of the line of that one
length ball from Umesh, 143.8kph, steered towards point
pitched up and angling in, driven towards mid-on
tossed up, length ball spins in towards off stump, clipped towards midwicket
fuller, Shafiq stays back in the crease and tucks the ball to square leg
a reverse-sweep from Misbah to get a boundary, it was a length ball spinning in, Misbah makes good contact
fuller and wider outside off, defended to the off side
carrom ball spins away, too short from Ashwin, driven towards long-on
length ball well outside off, defended off the front foot to the off side
starts with a pitched up delivery, punched towards long-off for a single
defended off the front foot towards cover
low full toss angling in, pushed towards mid-on this time
short and wide from Kohli, should have been put away for four, Kohli is lucky that it is only slapped towards deep point for a couple, that was 103kph
on the shorter side again, another ball that could have been put away, pulled away towards deep square
slightly fuller, though it is still a touch on the shorter side, left alone outside off
safely driven towards long-on for a single
round the wicket, a full ball on middle and off, clipped towards midwicket
length ball on legstump, nudged towards midwicket
length ball outside off, Ashwin continues to bowl from round the wicket, worked to the leg side for a single
played with soft hands towards square leg for a single
the famous Ashwin pause before he delivers, it is a full ball outside leg, tucked towards square leg
his first ball is driven towards long-on for a single
length ball heading for off and middle, pushed to the right of the bowler
length ball spins away a touch, defended off the front foot
slides on towards middle, clipped behind square leg
full ball, batsman skips down the track and punches the ball towards long-on
keeps it full, on leg stump, defended to the leg side by Misbah
length ball on leg stump, worked behind square leg

big pause once more from Ashwin, initially Misbah seemed to be shaping for a paddle-sweep, then after the pause, he changes the shot, looking to nudge it, it was down the leg side and that is a wide, the ball spills out of Dhoni's gloves to hit the stumps, third umpire to check whether Misbah is stumped, replays show Misbah is safe
Ashwin continues to bowl from round the stumps, an lbw appeal but that was pretty high
worked behind square leg
punched towards long-on for a single
nudged towards midwicket for a single
drops it short, it is angling outside off, Shafiq looks to power that through the off side but doesn't connect
forward defensive from Misbah
a touch short from Jadeja, punched off the back foot towards the bowler
backs away from the stumps, slaps the ball towards deep point
length ball on middle, defended down the pitch
pushed off the front foot, to the right of the bowler
tries to makes some room, that ball was a bit short, Shafiq cuts it but it can't beat backward point
length ball on leg stump, clipped behind square leg for a single
length ball pitching on off, eased towards long-on for a single
on the pads, worked towards deep square leg for a run that brings up Pakistan's 100 and a loud cheer from the fans
short ball outside off, slapped to backward point, Shafiq misses out on that one
length delivery, Shafiq drives, expects the ball to go to mid-on, Ashwin moves across quickly to cut that off
from over the wicket, length ball is eased towards long-on for a single
a touch short from Jadeja, Shafiq gets on the back foot and swipes that away to the midwicket boundary, Pakistan need more of this

nicely done by Shafiq, terrific stroke from him, that ball was just outside off, he deftly taps it past slip and too fine for short third man, Dinesh Karthik gives chase but there's no stopping that, 50 stand comes up
pushed towards mid-on for a single

Jadeja's magic run continues, he gets the wicket of Pakistan's main batsman, Misbah moves away from the stumps before the ball is bowled, then shuffles back, it is an angling delivery that heads for the stumps, Misbah misses and that crashes into the top of leg stump
gets off the mark straight away, eased to long-off for a single
defended to the off side to end a successful over from Jadeja
rubbish delivery, a half-tracker that should have been whacked, instead it is punched towards long-on
fuller this time, outside off and that is punched towards long-off for a single
a full ball on off stump, squeezed out towards the bowler
back of a length ball, defended back towards the bowler, that was only 99kph from Kohli
that was another rubbish delivery, another half-tracker, sat up for Malik, who swats that away to the midwicket boundary, Kohli has escaped with a few poor deliveries, not this time
length ball, defended behind point for a single
spins away just a touch, past the outside edge as Malik looks to defend
goes on the back foot, this one slides on and Malik defends it towards point
gets forward and defends back towards the bowler
length ball is worked towards long-on
full ball on the pads, clipped behind square leg
length ball on off stump, pushed towards mid-off, no run there, just one off the over, Jadeja racing through his spell
Ishant returns, starts with a length ball angling into the pads, clipped towards midwicket
short of length ball on leg stump, worked towards square leg
short of length ball and outside off, Malik slams that past point for four

Dhoni uses his pads like a hockey goalkeeper, not trying to catch that one as it awkwardly bounces through to him after beating Malik, just puts his pads in the ball to stop that one, that one from Ishant hit a crack on the pitch to stay low
slides that down the leg side
length ball on off stump, defended down the track
shortish ball outside off, bounced more than Malik expected, Malik was looking to thrash that through the off side, he misses
Jadeja continues to spear the ball in towards the stumps, worked towards midwicket for a single
Malik comes down the track, a quicker one from Jadeja, Malik was looking to play that to the off side, ends up defending it
pushed towards mid-on for a single
heading for leg stump, tucked off the pads to square leg
eased towards long-on for a single
full ball is driven to long-on, another quiet over from Jadeja comes to an end

down the leg side, India appeal for a caught-behind as Shafiq stays in the crease and looks to glance that one, umpire turns it down, after discussing with some of the others, Dhoni goes for a review, that looked a good decision on the first replay, seemed to have only taken the pad but the HotSpot shows a thin inside edge, and that is another terrific review by India, Shafiq is dismissed
short of length ball on leg stump, worked towards square leg for a single
on the pads, Ishant hoping to get another caught-behind down the leg side? tucked behind square for a single
full ball outside off, squeezed towards sweeper cover for a couple
length ball just outside off, defended off the back foot to the off side
full and well outside of, slapped towards sweeper cover for a single
punched off the back foot towards midwicket
pushed towards cover for a single
stays on the back foot, pushed towards short midwicket
driven towards long-on for one more
outside off, that one spins away from Malik, who is beaten by the dramatic turn there

given out lbw, Malik reviews it, that looked plumb on first view, perhaps Malik thinks he got some bat on it, no bat involved, that pitched just outside off and slanted in, struck in front of off and that was going on to hit, Malik has got to go
a leading edge as Ashwin bowls from round the wicket, the ball loops towards mid-on but lands safe
pitched up from over the wicket, defended to the leg side

great wicket for an offspinner this! tossed it up and that spun in a long way, far too good for Wahab, who can only glove it as he looks to defend, crashes into the stumps, Pakistan are seven down, will they be bowled out  before the 40 overs?
another inside-edge, this time the ball doesn't turn as much as the previous one, doesn't hit the stumps this time
Ashwin bowls a proper legspinner this time, a half-tracker from Ashwin, swatted towards midwicket, big confusion as Ajmal wants the second but Amin doesn't
flighted ball on the pads, Amin defends it to the leg side
full ball sliding onto the pads, looks to defend, that hits the pads, but it was sliding  down
worked towards midwicket, where Karthik makes a smart stop
defended off the front foot to the off side
careful defence off the front foot
spins away after pitching very short, poked to the off side, and that is a maiden, big cheers from the crowd
full and wide, Amin slashes that over point for four, good start for Pakistan
short of length ball outside off, looks to slap it through the off side but misses
length ball angling in towards off stump, defended down the track
worked towards deep midwicket, should have been a single, but Karthik looked up to see whether the batsmen were taking a second, took his eyes off the ball and misfields, conceding the second
back of length ball outside off, looks to slap it past point but misses
short of length once more, driven towards deep extra cover
short of length ball, that was tucked towards square leg
cracks that down the ground after shuffling out of the crease, between the bowler and mid-off for four
defended to the off side
on the pads, defended towards midwicket
slides in after pitching outside off, defended off the front foot
a thin inside-edge as Ajmal looks to defend off the front foot, sends the ball towards short fine leg
Umesh is back, slants this down the leg side, off the pads and through to Dhoni
short of length ball around off stump, defended towards point for a single
a touch short, slower one 123kph, pulled away for a single
short slower ball, Ajmal is tricked by that one, beaten as he looks to slap that through the off side
short once more, Ajmal swings it behind square leg for a single
length ball on middle stump, defended to the off side, end of a tight over from Umesh

diving take at short cover by Rohit, Ajmal has struggled to score today and his innings is over, it was a shortish delivery from Ishant, Ajmal backed away and flat-batted it, doesn't middle it and Rohit snaps up a low chance

length ball on off stump, punched towards mid-off, batsmen scamper a single, but have they made it? India seem certain that Kohli direct hit has got Junaid run out, and with good reason too, replays show Junaid is just short as the stump is literally broken, how good is India's fielding in this tournament? Pakistan lose their ninth
short of length ball outside off, Amin looks to cut that one but misses out
short of length once more, the usual Ishant length, defended from the crease to the off side
length ball angling into the stumps, Amin makes room and scoops that towards deep midwicket, drops short of Karthik there
no footwork there as he nonchalantly defends a length delivery to the off side
final over of the innings starts with a boundary, a touch short, that doesn't rise up much, Amin pulls it away for a boundary
full and well wide of off stump, but just within the guidelines for the umpire
length ball outside off, slapped towards deep point for a single

oh dear, what an end to the Pakistan innings, it was a rip-roaring drive from Irfan, absolutely hammered that full ball from Umesh, sadly for Irfan though it crashed into the stumps at the non-striker's end, Amin was way out of his crease and decided to go through for a single, Irfan also tries but Umesh has enough time to get back to the stumps and pull them out to complete the run-out

inn2.comm: he bowls a full and wide delivery which the batsman steers to third man
short-delivery first up, the batsman swivels to attempt a pull, but this is down the leg side and passes under the bat on its way to the keeper
another short delivery, sharp at 142 kph, the batsman thinks about a pull but sways out of the line awkwardly
fuller delivery to follow up the bouncer, the batsman slices it past point without any feet movement to third man
length delivery angled across the batsman, slightly wide outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
back of length delivery on the pads, the batsman stays on the back foot and tucks it to backward square leg for a single
short of length delivery, gets big on the batsman who tucks it to square leg
length ball outside off, defended to the off side

huge appeal for lbw, a vociferous appeal, turned down by the umpire, a discussion among the Pakistan players after which they decide to not review, that pitched well outside leg, so a good decision not to review
length ball on middle and leg, defended from the crease to the leg side
length ball on off stump, blocked off the front foot towards cover
length ball on leg stump, Rohit comes down the track and defends the ball down the track
pitched up, a crisp drive towards cover, a misfield allows a single
full ball just outside off, blocked off the front foot to the off side
short of length ball on middle stump, blocked towards cover
short of length ball on leg stump, defended to the leg side this side, stays in the crease as he plays that one
short of length ball angling across, left alone by Rohit
same length on the pads though, worked behind square leg
short of length ball, helped along towards deep backward square leg
pitched up and just outside off, looks to drive and a thick inside edge on to the pads, Junaid - always an enthusiastic appealer - mildly asks the question to the umpire
shot! Dhawan showing the form that has made him the tournament's highest run-getter, thrashes the ball through cover for four
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards deep backward point
length ball on off stump, driven through short cover for a single
short of length ball, looks to punch it through cover, bottom-edges it towards the bowler
length ball, Dhawan opens the face and pushes the ball towards cover
superb shot from Rohit, shows why he has such passionate backers despite a patchy record, gets forward and square drives that on the up for four
short ball, that was quick, 147.1kph, and terrific response from Rohit, who pulls that away to the square leg boundary for four more
short and quick once more, 146kph, angling across, Rohit drops his wrists and allows the ball through to the keeper
on the pads, tucked towards square leg, no run there
short of length and well outside off, steered towards backward point for a single
short ball and he shoulders arms, left alone by Dhawan
length ball on middle and off stump, defended from the crease to the off side
shortish ball on the leg stump, helped along down to fine leg for a single
Dhawan skips down the track and looks to mow that one but the ball sneaks under the bat, it was a short of length ball outside off, Dhawan grins after he misses that, Junaid has a word with him
this time Dhawan connects, and connects perfectly, thrashes that through cover for four, makes a bit of room to free his arms and hammers that short of length ball for a boundary
close to the off stump, similar length from Junaid, looks to chop that through the off side, he misses
a terrific yorker from Junaid, well done by Dhawan to keep that out, squeezed out towards mid-on, and a quick single is taken
length ball on the pads, tucked behind square for a single
short ball outside off, 147kph, Dhawan is in a hurry here, he powerfully cuts that over point for four
full ball, 143kph, just outside off, pushed towards extra cover for a single
shortish ball just outside off, deftly ramped over slip and down to third man for a single
full ball heading for the pads, 145kph, an inside edge towards midwicket for a single
superb ball to end the over, a full quick delivery on the stumps, defended by Rohit
worked behind square leg for a single
shortish ball outside off, too far outside off
a direct hit from Mohammad Irfan, Dhawan played it towards short fine leg and took off, he was sent back, and good thing too as Irfan's throw was perfect
skips down the track and looks to thrash the ball through the off side, but is beaten
short ball, pulled away powerfully to deep midwicket for a couple
length ball is squeezed towards deep point for two more, India galloping along here
shortish ball angling across, Rohit sways out of the way of that one
full ball down the leg side, swept fine and that's a couple of runs more for Dhawan
length ball spinning away, defended towards point off the front foot
takes a big stride forward and defends towards cover for a single
flighted and full, thick inside-edge as Rohit looks to play that, the ball rolls towards square leg
a touch shorter outside off, Dhawan slices that but can't get it past backward point

that one comes off quicker than Dhawan expected, it didn't spin away as Dhawan expected, he adjusts well and steers that towards the third man boundary to get three, Amin does well to stop that from reaching the rope
length ball, clipped behind square leg by Dhawan
spins in towards the pads, Rohit looks to work the ball towards the leg side, can't get bat on it
length ball, Rohit skips out of the crease and pushed towards long-on
pushed back to the bowler after coming down the track
full ball on the pads, clipped away towards deep midwicket
length ball spinning in, carefully defended
full ball is whacked towards sweeper cover
full ball, tapped towards mid-on
flighted delivery and that turns in, Rohit looks to defend, a shout for lbw, would have spun down the leg side

length ball spinning in, Rohit clips that one straight to midwicket, and he walks off a disappointed man, nothing menacing in that delivery, Rohit has thrown it away, no third consecutive century stand for the opening wicket
pitched up, spinning in, tucked towards midwicket by the new batsman Kohli
length ball outside off, Kohli had to reach out for that, he square drives it behind point for four, what a shot to get off the mark
Hafeez from round the wicket, length ball is defended to the off side
a bit of width, Dhawan gets on the back foot and slaps it towards backward point for a single
spins in from over the wicket, blocks it off the back foot
a length ball on the pads, clipped towards square leg for a single, 38 more needed by India
looking to drive down the ground, takes a thick inside-edge onto the pads after skipping down the track
heading for leg stump, Dhawan defends down the pitch
short of length ball just outside off, defended behind point
length ball outside off, defended from the crease to the off side
short of length ball and just outside off, that was 150.1kph from Wahab, steered down to third man for a couple
short of length ball just outside off, blocked off the back foot
on a length and on the pads, defended towards midwicket
shortish ball, just back of a length and outside off, guided down to third man once more, only a single this time
flighted ball spins in, defended towards midwicket by Kohli
similar ball, similar response from Kohli
spins in, Kohli decides to play that off the back foot, gets deep in the crease and plays it against the turn towards cover
the topspinner from Ajmal, Dhawan hit on the thigh pad as he looks to play that one, the ball rolls out to short fine
played with soft hands towards point, nicely done by Dhawan, picks up a single
quicker delivery that turns back in on leg stump, Kohli pushes it to the off side
wielding the bat like  wand, twirls that away behind point for four, short of a length ball just outside off, lovely hit off the middle of the bat
wide down the leg side
short ball, everything going Dhawan's way, Dhawan wanted to smear that through the leg side, takes a top edge and that flies over the keeper for four
that's the end of Dhawan's innings, he has holed out to third man, it was a short ball outside off, Dhawan wanted to hammer that over point but can't control it and is gone for 48
shortish ball just outside off, Karthik drops his wrists and lets that go, 141kph
same length, good line as well from Wahab, another leave from Karthik Wahab bowling a good spell here
pitched up this time, just outside off, 146kph, Karthi shoulders arms
crowd catch there ( and I got quite excited too) as Kohli plays a bump ball to midwicket
spins a long way in, Kohli waits in the crease and tucks the ball towards square leg
length ball is pushed towards long-on for a single
spun away from Karthik, the doosra from Ajmal, takes the outside edge, the ball almost runs away to the boundary but Wahab puts in a dive to stop that one
drops it short and Kohli waits for it on the back foot and slams that over long-on for four, briefly the fielder at long-on was interested, but that had just enough to go past him
clipped to midwicket for a single
length ball on middle and off, Kohli gets behind the line of that one and defends, 140.6kph from Wahab
short of a length ball outside off, and that is steered towards backward point
tucked towards square leg for one more
full and wide outside off, not so wide that it is declared illegal
back of a length ball just outside off, pushed towards point for one more
short of length ball on middle stump, defended down the track
spins in from a length, pushed off the back foot towards the bowler
length ball spinning in towards leg stump, clipped towards midwicket for a single
flighted and full, Karthik gets to the pitch of that and caresses that through cover, timed superbly by Karthik and India need another seven to win
a touch shorter this time, blocked off the back foot
doosra that spins away from Karthik, who waits on the back foot and defends to the off side
drops it short, spins in towards middle, flat-batted towards mid-on
shortish length, just outside off, defended from the crease to the off side
full and wide, Karthik tries to reach that, gets it on the toe of the bat, the ball dribbles to the off side
short and quick, Karthik goes for the hook but doesn't connect, 139kph

short of length ball on middle, works it away towards midwicket, goes for the quick single, Wahab does the fielding and fires the ball towards the non-striker's end, Karthik has to dive to make his ground
length ball outside off, slapped towards point
on legstump, Kohli swivels and dispatches that to the midwicket boundary, didn't seem to hit that very well
spins down the leg side, helped  behind square leg for a quick single, and India have won the dead rubber
